sources.title: Super Bowl 60 Seahawks vs. Patriots cross-sport props, picks vs. Karl-Anthony Towns, other NBA stars Sunday
sources.description: DraftKings has some interesting cross-sport props regarding Super Bowl 60 between the Seahawks and Patriots with some NBA action on Sunday before the big game. Expert Matt Severance gives four picks.
